## Roadmap {.smaller .crunch-title .crunch-ul .crunch-quarto-figure .crunch-li-8}

:::: {layout="[1,1]"}
::: {#left-5300}

<center>

**5300 &rarr; Now**

</center>

* In 5300 (or 5000, or 5100), you learned a bunch of *ad hoc* models: Linear Regression, Decision Trees, SVMs, Neural Nets
* PGMs provide a **language** we can use to tell a computer how to estimate **parameters** in these models from **data**

:::
::: {#img-5300}

:::
